quote: I don’t run to add days to my life, I run to add life to my days.
author: Ronald Rook

quote: In running, it doesn’t matter whether you come in first, in the middle of the pack, or last. You can say, “I have finished.” There is a lot of satisfaction in that.
author: Fred Lebow

quote: One run can change your day, many runs can change your life.
author: Unknown

quote: Running is the greatest metaphor for life, because you get out of it what you put into it.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Keep running and don't look down, because if you do, you'll see the stumps that are your legs. You're an amputee.
author: Arnav Kamath

quote: Every marathon I ran, I knew I had a faster one in me.
author: Dick Beardsley

quote: I run so I can eat more.
author: Evyn Catton

quote: I like morning runs, but morning implies sunlight. No more 4 a.m. wake-ups, you maniac.
author: Neon

quote: Run. Because zombies will eat the untrained ones first.
author: From the Zombie Apocalypse Survival Guide

quote: If it doesn’t challenge you, it doesn’t change you.
author: Fred DeVito

quote: We are designed to run, and we increase our chance of daily happiness when we do so.
author: Jeff Galloway

quote: I love running cross country. On a track, I feel like a hamster.
author: Robin Williams

quote: It gave me a natural endorphin high, but it also helped me sleep, so it was perfect. It’s easy to understand how people replace addiction with exercise.
author: Eminem

quote: It makes me feel like I can conquer anything that comes at me. I’m never tapped out. I’m never tired around my two kids. I owe a lot of that to running.
author: Travis Barker

quote: I woke up on my birthday and said, “I want to run 10 miles.” I just wanted to see if I could run double-digit mileage.
author: Sterling K. Brown

quote: Running has been my main form of exercise. I’ve been running five or six days a week. I love it.
author: Natalie Coughlin

quote: It started to become what I looked forward to most; it was the only time I got to be in my own head.
author: Rob Riggle

quote: Running is the basis of all the training that I do… it’s like an escape.
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: Don’t be afraid to fail. It’s not the end of the world and in many ways, it’s the first step toward learning something better and getting better at it.
author: Jon Hamm

quote: Fast running isn’t forced. You have to relax and let the run come out of you.
author: Desiree Linden

quote: To me, sweat is workout bliss.
author: Brooke Burke-Charvet

quote: Slow runners make fast runners look good. Thank you.
author: From the back of a T-shirt

quote: There are clubs you can’t belong to, neighbors you can’t live in, schools you can’t get into, but the roads are always open.
author: NIKE

quote: The miracle isn’t that I finished. The miracle is that I had the courage to start.
author: John Bingham

quote: Run when you can, walk if you have to, crawl if you must, just never give up.
author: Dean Karnazes

quote: If the hill has its own name, then it's probably a pretty tough hill.
author: Marty Stern

quote: Nothing lifts me out of a bad mood better than a hard workout on my treadmill. It never fails. To us, exercise is nothing short of a miracle.
author: Cher

quote: I am 100 percent convinced that working out is part of what makes me so happy.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: Running is great for your body. It will increase your energy levels and helps you to clear your mind.
author: Heidi Klum

quote: Just keep moving. Someone said this to me a long time ago. It’s a Buddhist saying, I think: “There is no wasted effort.”
author: Lauren Graham

quote: Tough runs don't last; tough runners do.
author: Book name from amazon

quote: All great achievements require time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I feel like when I am running, it not only helps change me physically, it also improves my state of mind.
author: Derek Hough

quote: I love the way that it makes my body feel and it’s just my time for myself where I can get out there and think and let my mind go.
author: Laila Ali

quote: If I continue to set goals and accomplish those goals, that means I’m doing something right.
author: Kevin Hart

quote: I’m all about breaking mental boundaries, and training for a marathon falls right into the Jedi mind-training I need.
author: Alicia Keys

quote: Life is short. Running makes it seem longer.
author: Baron Hansen

quote: Running is something you can do and be alone in your thoughts, and I like that.
author: Carole Radziwill

quote: Run often. Run long. But never outrun your joy of running.
author: Julie Isphording

quote: Something happens to me when I run. People think it’s crazy when I say it. All of my ideas come in when I run. That is my time where it’s just me, where I get to create.
author: Theo Rossi

quote: Don’t dream of winning, train for it!
author: Mo Farah

quote: If you can’t fly then run, if you can’t run then walk, if you can’t walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: The only failure is not to try.
author: George Clooney

quote: Be so good they can’t ignore you.
author: Steve Martin

quote: If the sun comes up, I have a chance.
author: Venus Williams

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If you have a body, you are an athlete.
author: Bill Bowerman

quote: I’ve failed over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Quality is much better than quantity. One home run is much better than two doubles.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Everyone in life is looking for a certain rush. Racing is where I get mine.
author: John Trautmann

quote: Your sweat is your fat crying. Keep it up.
author: From a runner's T-shirt

quote: Good things come slow. Especially in distance running.
author: Bill Dellinger

quote: When I’m working 16-hour days and I can’t work out, I get angry very easily. It’s because I’m missing all those good endorphins. For me, exercise equals happiness.
author: Heather Morris

quote: Just running the streets was absolutely everything and more than I possibly expected.
author: Jennie Finch

quote: I run every day. It’s like medicine.
author: Jennifer Carpenter

quote: If we had a drug that did what exercise did, it would be the biggest revolution ever and would be promoted all over the world. And all you have to do is go out for a run.
author: Greg Wells, Ph.D.

quote: Exercise is so amazing from the inside out. I feel so alive and have so much energy.
author: Vanessa Hudgens

quote: You can’t be upset at the results you didn’t get for the work you didn’t do.
author: Jess Sims

quote: As we run, we become.
author: Amby Burfoot

quote: Things that hurt, instruct.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Go fast enough to get there, but slow enough to see.
author: Jimmy Buffett

quote: Running is the classical road to self-consciousness, self-awareness, and self-reliance.
author: Noel Carroll

quote: Runners just do it – they run for the finish line even if someone else has reached it first.
author: Unknown

quote: Nothing, not even pain, lasts forever. If I can just keep putting one foot in front of the other, I will eventually get to the end.
author: Kim Cowart

quote: Just stick with it. What seems hard now will one day be your warm-up.
author: Unknown

quote: It’s an acquired skill, being able to discuss your love life, children, and friends, all while you’re running! But we have mastered it.
author: Reese Witherspoon

quote: Your mind is your strongest muscle.
author: Tunde Oyeneyin

quote: Coming back to running after a few weeks off is really tough. It’s humbling. Nothing wrong with a large dose of humility.
author: Davina McCall

quote: Running a marathon is not a question of whether it will be painful, but when it will be painful. It does help to have a sense of humor, but I’m also respectful of the race.
author: Will Ferrell

quote: I choose the things that I want to do, and they all revolve around one thing: food. Even my running has to do with food. I run to stay in shape so I can eat what I want.
author: Bobby Flay

quote: I like trails more than roads. I’ve jumped over my share of rattlesnakes. I’ve seen mountain lions, coyotes, bobcats, skunks, hawks.
author: Reggie Miller

quote: How do you know if someone ran a marathon? Don’t worry, they’ll tell you.
author: Jimmy Fallon

quote: I love running cross country. On a track, I feel like a hamster.
author: Robin Williams

quote: A good laugh and a long run are the two best cures for anything.
author: Unknown

quote: Jogging is very beneficial. It’s good for your legs and your feet. It’s also very good for the ground. It makes it feel needed.
author: Charles M. Schultz

quote: My doctor told me that jogging could add years to my life. I think he was right. I feel ten years older already.
author: Milton Berle

quote: Don’t be a jogger, they’re the one’s who find dead bodies.
author: Amanda Brooks

quote: The trouble with jogging is that, by the time you realize you’re not in shape for it, it’s too far to walk back.
author: Franklin P. Jones

quote: I’ve got 99 problems, so I went on a run to ignore them all.
author: Unknown

quote: I believe that the Good Lord gave us a finite number of heartbeats and I’m damned if I’m going to use up mine running up and down a street.
author: Neil Armstrong

quote: We can’t all be heroes because someone has to sit on the curb and clap as they go by.
author: Will Rogers

quote: Good things come slow – especially in distance running.
author: Bill Dellinger

quote: There is magic in misery. Just ask any runner.
author: Dean Karnazes

quote: I am a running joke. Waking up at 4:30 am and jogging anywhere from 11 to 23 miles has been nothing short of horrifying.
author: Ryan Reynolds

quote: If you’ve never had a bad day running, you’re probably doing something wrong. If you’ve never had a good day running, you’re definitely doing something wrong.
author: Mark Remy

quote: I go running when I have to. When the ice cream truck is doing sixty.
author: Wendy Liebman

quote: Step one to running a marathon: You run. There is no step two.
author: Barney Stinson

quote: Why run, when you can walk?
author: Lucas Jansta

quote: Running is a lot like life. Only 10 percent of it is exciting. 90 percent of it is slog and drudge.
author: Dave Bedford

quote: Run like hell and get the agony over with.
author: Clarence DeMar

quote: Most people run a race to see who is fastest. I run a race to see who has the most guts.
author: Steve Prefontaine

quote: Unless you puke, faint, or die, keep going!
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: If you still look cute after working out, you didn’t go hard enough.
author: Unknown

quote: Whoever established the high road and how high it should be should be fired.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: The pain of running relieves the pain of living.
author: Jacqueline Gunn

quote: I run because if I didn't, I'd be sluggish and glum and spend too much time on the couch.
author: Peter Sagal

quote: If you run, you are a runner. It doesn't matter how fast or how far.
author: Julie Isphording

quote: The miracle isn't that I finished. The miracle is that I had the courage to start.
author: John Bingham

quote: If it's not on Strava, it didn't happen.
author: Aubrey Lindberg-buchhorn

quote: JUST DO IT.
author: NIKE

quote: With all the cramps, and all the strains, come to jacked legs with all the veins.
author: Jesus Higas

quote: Your legs aren't giving out. Your heads giving in.
author: Christian Gonzalez

quote: Wherever your mind goes, your body follows, Wherever your thoughts go, your life follows.
author: Ryan Holiday

quote: Your mind will quit a thousand times before your body will. Feel the fear and do it anyway.
author: Stacy Westfall

quote: It's not about winning, it's about seeing other people lose.
author: Haven Gier
